parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Broken Commands

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Create MP role for the unit. The roles created this way are used for [[Multiplayer Scripting#Join In Progress|Join In Progress]] and [[Team Switch]]. 

</value></part><part><name>pr</name>=<value> <template><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Warning </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Doesn't work as intended - does currently nothing in <template><title>arma3</title></template>.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''setPlayable''' unitName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[setPlayable]] _aPerson</code>
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on december 19, 2009 - 22:48</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Lou Montana|Lou Montana]]</dt>
<dd class="note">if you want to add a [[Team Switch|TeamSwitchable]] unit (at least in <template><title>arma2</title></template>), better use [[addSwitchableUnit]]


<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
